name: Out of Place
description:
Out of Place (shortened to OoP) is a 2D platformer puzzle. The story is about a video game character of a ninja game, and the main character is the protagonist of the game who got taken to outside of his own game and he must go trough places and obstacles in order to find his way back to his game world. 

Within the transitions between world, he is assisted by a character named helper, helper acts as an NPC who provides hints, tutorials, and general interaction with the player.

This game is made as a part of student group project
